import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default function EditExercise() { let navigate = useNavigate() const[exercise, setExercise] = useState({ name:"", bodyPart:"", numberOfSets:"", numberOfReps:"", weight:"" }) const{name, bodyPart, numberOfSets, numberOfReps, weight}=exercise const onInputChange = (event) => { setExercise({...exercise,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } const onSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); await axios.put("http://localhost:8080/exercises/add", exercise) navigate("/") } return (
